content: in final st <16 half_double_crochet 8 chain 1 sps> row 5 - 40 repeat row 3 - 4 continuing to alternate balls of yarn every other row fasten_off and weave in all ends block using desired method have leftover yarn add a couple tassels to your shawl for the sample i made two tassels measuring 6 5 inches each to do this i cut 40 strands of yarn measuring 13 inches each this was accomplished by wrapping yarn 40 times around my iphone for each tassel then cutting at one end i then wrapped each tassel 10 times to create the loop which i sewed to either end of my shawl
